4d64009bcba5.title: It deeply offends me when judges or politicians claim that minority groups are too stupid…

paragraphs.text: It deeply offends me when judges or politicians claim that minority groups are too stupid, incapable or incompetent to be able to accomplish such a simple task as to get a free ID card.
paragraphs.name: 3c63

e74fa161eee6.title: Ian Millhiser is a low life bottom feeder.

paragraphs.text: Ian Millhiser is a low life bottom feeder. He has learned that he is able to make a living out of keeping the troubles, the wrongs, and the hardships of the black race before the public. Be it real or imagined makes no difference to him so long as he gets to keep his job.

a78b54e874c3.title: “Discriminating” against ILLEGAL voters is NOT unconstitutional; and all those supposedly…

paragraphs.text: “Discriminating” against ILLEGAL voters is NOT unconstitutional; and all those supposedly discriminated against voters of color managed to get ID to get on welfare, get bank accounts, etc, so the claim that they’re blocked from voting by such laws is SPURIOUS, and the courts KNOW that; but libs/Dems want illegals voting against America!

a895da33fc1c.title: It’s a false narrative, you know it and more Americans know it everyday.

paragraphs.text: It’s a false narrative, you know it and more Americans know it everyday. One of the reasons your party has lost over 900 Legislature Seats, 69 House Seats, 13 Senate Seats, 12 State Houses and the White House in the last couple years. You people are pathetic and make me sick

8008d20bcc3e.title: this is beyond insulting to black people .

paragraphs.text: this is beyond insulting to black people . what makes you think they dont have the ability to get an id. are you implying they are too stupid to get an id. are you implying its just too hard and they shouldnt be subject to this atrocity of actually having to figure out how to get some form of id.
paragraphs.name: 0f8d

paragraphs.text: complete and utter nonsense
paragraphs.name: b3c6

3add735181ae.title: Texas is the only state in the US, where you have to prove citizenship with a passport or birth…

paragraphs.text: Texas is the only state in the US, where you have to prove citizenship with a passport or birth certificate to get an ID. Not driver’s license, an ID. To vote, you don’t even have to show that much evidence of citizenship. So it’s a cumbersome requirement on Texans that is not equal to norms. We’re not stupid, we see what the white, Texan majority is…
paragraphs.name: 8a9b

28860ed81f23.title: Stop using my race as an issue…..Every

paragraphs.text: Stop using my race as an issue…..Every black person I know has no issue obtaining an ID. If not they would not have been able to have a job (the I-9 Form), buy a car, open a bank account, rent and apartment, purchase a home……..what I am really hearing is the true racist out there stating….you black people are too stupid, ignorant and dumb to be able…
